name: dynamic/recipe-silverstripe-base-site
description: A kitchen sink install of SilverStripe Base Site.

suggest.dynamic/recipe-silverstripe-elemental-ba: Content blocks commonly used with dynamic/silverstripe-base-site
suggest.nswdpc/silverstripe-elemental-modeladmin: Provides an administration area for managing all content blocks created in Silverstripe website
suggest.nswdpc/silverstripe-thereisnouserform: Hide/Remove 'User Defined Form' pages in the CMS when using silverstripe/userforms together with dnadesign/silverstripe-elemental-userforms
suggest.ryanpotter/silverstripe-cms-theme: Allows for customizing colors, admin groups, and admin icons in the CMS
suggest.undefinedoffset/silverstripe-nocaptcha: Adds Google reCAPTCHA to SilverStripe userforms
